events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred on the morning of April 30th involving their sedan and another vehicle at an intersection.
Upon review, the claim was categorized as an Auto Accident due to the vehicle collision and reported damages to the car.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the case to ensure a smooth resolution of the auto accident claim.
The insurer confirmed receipt of the claim and acknowledged the circumstances involving the vehicle accident.
Request sent to the claimant asking for photos of the damaged car, police report, and contact details of the involved parties.
The claimant submitted all requested documents including police report and vehicle photos showing the extent of the collision damage.
Investigation initiated to assess liability and verify the facts surrounding the auto accident.
Investigation concluded confirming the claimant was not at fault and verifying the extent of vehicle damage.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover full repair costs of the vehicle as per damage assessments.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the prompt handling and fair settlement proposal for their car accident claim.
Insurance claim approved formally after customer acceptance of the settlement terms regarding the auto accident damages.
The payment for the approved settlement was issued to the claimantâ€™s account to proceed with car repairs.
The claim was officially closed after final confirmation that vehicle repairs were completed and funds were received.
